data.small: SELECT COUNT(*) AS N, IF(SUBSTRING_INDEX(DOW.remote_host,'.',-1)=0,LOWER(SUBSTRING_INDEX(DOW.remote_host,'.',-1)),'?') as C FROM downloads AS DOW FORCE INDEX(idx_downloads_date) WHERE MONTH(DOW.date) - 0 = 02 AND (DOW.file LIKE '%/emf-sdo-xsd-Standalone-%.zip' OR DOW.file LIKE '%/emf-sdo-xsd-SDK-%.zip' OR DOW.file LIKE '%/emf-sdo-SDK-%.zip' OR DOW.file LIKE '%/emf-sdo-runtime-%.zip' OR DOW.file LIKE '%/org.eclipse.emf.ecore\_%.jar') GROUP BY C
